# Tips on running LVHI Harbormaster shuttles - The total power load for the shuttle in standard complectation is 36 [bold]kW[/bold]. For more general info on the power grid, see the guidebook article [textlink="Power" link="Power"]. - Be warned that D-K Jr.-type portable generator is radioactive, wear radiation suit when working with the generator. - For basics of shuttle piloting see [textlink="Piloting" link="Piloting"].
